TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Slamaw, title = Slamaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slamaw} }

S.FORM: == Slamaw == u sulit nu Hulam: 佳陽部落 i Taichung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Slamaw. u kasalumaluma' nu Slamaw sa, 148 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 271 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 199 ku tademaw, pakalatu 73%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 72 ku tademaw, pakalatu 27%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 69%, Bunun 4%. Slamaw u sulit nu Hulam: 梨山部落 i Taichung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Slamaw. u kasalumaluma' nu Slamaw sa, 287 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 705 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 334 ku tademaw, pakalatu 47%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 371 ku tademaw, pakalatu 53%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 43%, Amis 3%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 1%.

== Slamaw == o solit no Holam: 佳陽部落 i Taichong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Slamaw. o kasalomaloma' no Slamaw sa, 148 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 271 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 199 ko tademaw, pakalato 73%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 72 ko tademaw, pakalato 27%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 69%, Bonon 4%. Slamaw o solit no Holam: 梨山部落 i Taichong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Slamaw. o kasalomaloma' no Slamaw sa, 287 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 705 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 334 ko tademaw, pakalato 47%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 371 ko tademaw, pakalato 53%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 43%, Amis 3%, Bonon 1%, zomazoma 1%.
